title: Google search
text: Although google always seems to read my mind and know what I‚Äôm gonna search for ahead of time.    The MAIN ISSUE I‚Äôm currently having is deleting my searches.  I have ocd about a clear search bar. I have cleared it out from the Bottom of the google homepage and even go to delete activity daily using the date delete.   Ever since the update it never leaves.   It drives me crazy.  I delete daily. 7 day and monthly and still it doesn‚Äôt leave.  Ugh.  Next update return to the previous way.

title: Can‚Äôt download images so switching to Chrome app
text: I‚Äôve always used the Google app and believe it‚Äôs the best search engine app. However with the current update I can‚Äôt download images. When I hold down on the image to download it just gives me an option to ‚Äúfind source image‚Äù or ‚Äúopen in another app.‚Äù I tried searching for a fix and couldn‚Äôt find anything. As much as I like this app it‚Äôs just too inconvenient to not be able to download images quickly. Switching to chrome until they fix this.

title: Feature not working
text: I downloaded Google mainly for the wide variety of search options It has to offer. Unfortunately, the main feature I was looking forward to it was the ‚Äúhum to search‚Äù. I have done every single step required in order to use the hum to search but unfortunately nothing seems to work. My phone is the iPhone 14 Pro Max. I would be happy to receive a response with a fix for this issue if possible thank you.

title: Google Cards Not Fully Loading
text: Love the app. Would have rated it 5* if it weren‚Äôt for issues with the Google Cards. While this is an amazing feature, my articles don‚Äôt fully load. When I tap an article, usually just the 1st paragraph opens, then the remaining portion is completely blank; pics, vids and everything. The only fix is to clear the app from the background, then it happens again within 10-15 mins. This is on an iPhone 6.

title: Filters for Hotels and dates
text:
Dear Google Maps,

I frequently rely on your service for hotel searches, but I‚Äôve encountered some persistent issues that need addressing. Firstly, the filter functionality seems to be malfunctioning. For instance, when I set specific dates for my hotel stay, the system unexpectedly changes them as I browse through different hotel options. This inconsistency is quite frustrating.

Additionally, there‚Äôs a problem with the rating filter. When I specify a minimum rating of 4.0, I expect to see only hotels that meet this criterion. However, the results often include hotels with lower ratings. This not only wastes my time but also forces me to contact third-party services, which usually results in unproductive and time-consuming discussions with customer service representatives who often seem indifferent to my concerns.

I hope these issues can be resolved promptly to ensure a more efficient and user-friendly experience. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

title: Good browser but not integrated well with iPhone
text: It‚Äôs a great app and in my opinion works better and looks better than the Chrome app. However, when clicking links that should open another app like directions for example, it only has the option for Google maps. I use Apple Maps so that‚Äôs annoying. Also the most annoying thing is I am unable to set it as my default browser. I can only set Safari or Chrome. Which is super annoying when opening links from other apps.

title: J&M Landscaping Longmont, CO
text:
Jorge and his crew have done two projects for me, one was to fix our failing window wells (6) take out and new ones installed.
All new concrete sidewalks and stairs, and the installation of all new piping and new sprinkler heads and controls. This project was completed on time and on budget. They also completed a grass removal project where they replaced to dead grass with small landscape rocks and edging. We love the low maintenance factor. I highly recommend this team from J&M Landscaping. Gus Lester

title: Excellent Office !
text: I go to Dr. J.Fluegge our primary care physician the care she gives is very thorough as well as professional. Her office is run with great nurses Chris and Marina always make sure I am seen quickly when necessary. I recently went for my pre operative clearance they scheduled me quickly plus everything went very smoothly. If you are looking for a good physician as well an office that is run in a professional manner I would highly recommend this one!

title: Crashes When Searching or Browsing
text:
Love the Google app but I found the Google Chrome app to be much less buggy. When making a search, the app becomes unresponsive. 

9/10 times refreshing doesn‚Äôt work and I have to close the app and try again. Websites also become unresponsive. You try to open up something and it just freezes. Chrome doesn‚Äôt seem to have this issue. 

This seems to be an ongoing problem even with the updates over the last year at the time I‚Äôm writing this review.

title: Developers please read
text: Hi! I just wanted to say that this app is awesome and ingenious but could use an update. Could you fix the algorithm or whatever it is (I‚Äôm not tech savvy) so that the answers that pop up immediately are true and reliable? As a student it‚Äôs super frustrating to do research but not know what to trust like certain websites. Other than that, it‚Äôs a really great app highly recommended. I also enjoy my experience on Google Drive Google classroom and others like that. Thanks guys peace and love.‚úåüèª

title: Poor execution
text: The app does ok for what it‚Äôs meant for. Searches. The problem is with the ‚Äúcards‚Äù that display news and other articles based on your searches and preferences put in your profile. Often it will bring up articles that I have no interest in. There is an option to ‚Äúhide this story‚Äù or ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not interested in _____ subject.‚Äù  However, the app constantly ignores when I click on one. The same articles I‚Äôve said I‚Äôm not interested in will show up over and over no matter how many times I clicked on the hide or not interested button. I‚Äôve sent feedback to Google numerous times but nothing has changed.

title: Previous searches
text: After the update it doesn‚Äôt give me the option to turn off the feature, that shows your precious searches. This is very annoying, especially if you don‚Äôt want just anyone seeing what you‚Äôve searched before. The site just loops me back to the same pages over and over again, with no help when I try to find where to stop this. I‚Äôve received no help or support from google at all. It‚Äôs a shame to say I‚Äôm going to be deleting this app because of it. Always preferred it over any other search engine, but it‚Äôs because very hard to navigate through, and now embarrassing when other people who use my phone can see things I‚Äôve searched.

title: App was great but now there's a problem....
text: So basically this is a great app untill something doesn't work well. Uhm so basically I was using the incognito feature and then there's a setting where it locks out after 15 mins which I turned on. A day later I realize that I go into the app and whatever I was browsing a day before just pops up again and it's been like this. I'm just saying that what if someone who's suing this feature is trying to browse privately and someone can just open it up. Like we had this feature offered to us can we at least have it work?

title: Worst thing about the app
text: The one incredibly frustrating thing about this app is it‚Äôs stupid design. The google window at the bottom gets in the way more often than it should. When there is something at the bottom of the screen that either needs to be selected or you need to be able to put a curser there to begin typing, the google window is blocking it. I‚Äôm already using your app and your search engine so what‚Äôs the need to promote another google search? I get that it may be useful because other people have viewed these selections but at least give a user the option to turn it off. I hate safari but I will probably be deleting this app. Very frustrating.

title: Hard to navigate
text:
This latest iteration of Dropbox does not work well at all.  When I look for a file, it is almost impossible to find it.  I know into which folder it is in.  However, trying to find that folder is not easy.

When I go to Dropbox, I expect to find the list of folders and files on the root level.  Then I can choose the file or folder from there.  It should work as smoothly as it does on the computer.

Opening Dropbox on the iPad finds me facing a complete mess of stuff. I don‚Äôt even know which icon to choose.  The layout is not user friendly.

title: My thought.
text: So this app is a big company that needs to know everything that could ever exist and what you need to know about like history,math, and so much more. And Google is a good app that has a lot of things to know. So if you need to know about something that another person knows and you didn‚Äôt know about that you can just Google that thing that you don‚Äôt know about and will so only know about it.

title: Why

Am I doing something wrong so that there is no feature but the google search?

title: Google is now trash!
text: This app is absolutely terrible. Once you connect your gmail account to google it TRACKS EVERYTHING! And then it spams you with stories on things you have looked up or even just spoken aloud about. But if there are stories or articles you wish to not read. Sorry you are out of luck. No matter how many times you click show me less articles like this or hide article if you refresh your page guess what articles pop up. The ‚Äúhidden‚Äù ones. So it doesn‚Äôt work like it says it should and then it‚Äôs constantly listening and taking your data. I much rather go use a browser that lets me actually browse!

title: Freezing up constantly
text: I‚Äôve never had any issues with google until here recently. It‚Äôs always been my favorite app and easiest to use. But this past weeks it‚Äôs been freezing up randomly whenever I try to use it causing me to have to close out of it and reopen it. I thought maybe it was because it was in need of an update, but when I tried to go update it it had gotten stuck on that too? I‚Äôm going to restart my phone but I‚Äôve never had this issue with any other app and no other app I own is having issues updating. I own an iPhone XR.

title: Best by default
text: Google is the best compared to all the other search engines. I don‚Äôt like all the ads and how your search results are geared to where you previously searched even after you delete your previous search history, disable all the tracking features, and clear cache....There is NO need to do underhanded tactics if you are truly the best.  It‚Äôs sad that such a large company feels they must have no ethics or moral boundaries in order to dominate the competition. Tracking the public and taking away their privacy is not freedom at all nor is it technological genius.

title: Works great
text: Siri is really fickle for me, whenever I use the voice recognition it takes at least three tries. Google gets it right the first time 99% of the time, and then finds exactly what I'm looking for. If you aren't finding what you're looking for, then don't blame Google because you probably have individualized searching needs not matched by the general public and Google can't (and shouldn't have to) conform to that. I highly recommend the app.

title: Going to give it another month
text: I love the customizing of the google app but it isn‚Äôt as easy to use as Yahoo and some of the features are a lot harder to search through. I don‚Äôt like the fact that there‚Äôs only certain things you can add to your home screen like no military news or half the time the news they post is pure drama with actors and actresses. Could be a great app but still needs some more work. The other weird thing is a bunch of times it‚Äôs frozen so I just open the safari up and it works perfect but when I go back to the google app it just freezes and doesn‚Äôt try to load the page.

title: Where's all of the underground stuff???
text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE Google. I always have, and I always will. #1 best App EVER..... In my opinion anyways. My only concern is that it's almost impossible to find things that aren't of the contemporary aspect. What if I wanted to find a legitimate source for legal steroids to buy online???? Or what if I wanted to purchase an antique painting on the black market for cheaper than what I can get it for in the us??? Those types of searches aren't found anywhere on the Google search App. I'd give this App 100+ stars if I could actually find uncontemporary information on these kind of things!!!!!

title: Stories are half blank
text:
For over a month now each news story I choose to read only shows the first paragraph. The rest of the story is missing. 
Just a lonely blank white nothingness. Reinstalled, rebooted til I‚Äôm blue in the face. Please fix. Thank you.

Mine too
Start reading a story and then it goes missing.  It usually ends in the middle of a sentence. And the rest of the page is plain old white. Please help me!!! I‚Äôve tried everything at least ten times. So annoying. HELP!!!

title: Good BUT..
text: it feels choppy. He whole ‚Äúintuitive‚Äù search then having multiple tabs to save yours searches thing is too choppy. It was a LOT better before, having being able to close all your tabs with a single single click, and that was that. With the whole searching and everything the animations are too broad and choppy. There‚Äôs also a bug whenever you swipe up (which is significantly slow and too time consuming), that the initial window you‚Äôre closing will pop back up again for some reason. I love the app I use it everyday it‚Äôs just their new updates are a bit too much for me. iPhone 8 review.

title: Literally about to delete Google
text: I thought of Google the other day and I went on and the first thing that I saw was a blue tile and a blank space. I was confused for about 5 minutes until I saw the x button on the side. That‚Äôs not all though, when I try to open a tab, it makes me sit on the loading screen for like 10-20 minutes. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs just my internet but all my other apps that need internet work. I even closed all of my tabs and created a new tab and it still is loading for like 10-20 minutes which makes me frustrated because I can‚Äôt wait for 10-20 minutes just for its to search one thing.

title: Never does what you want it to do‚Ä¶
text: I‚Äôm a UX designer, so I see pretty bad user experience design all around me. Sometimes I want to do something specific with a file. Let‚Äôs say for example, to simply stream it on my TV. Google Drive doesn‚Äôt understand how to make those simple things actually simple. Google has tried for years to make their interfaces simple but, at the end of the day, they just stink at it. This platform is ok to store data and media, but it‚Äôs really bad at allowing you to do things the things you want or need to do with those assets. Good luck with Google‚Äôs historically poor UX design!

title: Iceland Tours
text: The best. We had started planning with another firm only to be suddenly abandoned only two weeks before we were to leave. Yikes! We found Iceland Tours and within several days they had arranged our whole tour, including a three day private tour with a fantastic tour guide. Everything was done efficiently, easily and gracefully. They saved our trip and I wouldn‚Äôt consider another trip without them.

title: Google features
text:
Crimsonkitten:
If you‚Äôve found Google to be so good, then how on earth can they lose the very features that have an edge over other competitors? No, no, it is unwise to ditch Google because of this excuse.
The second question is this: Why don‚Äôt you work WITH Google to return the features you‚Äôre talking about? What‚Äôs so difficult about pointing out something that will help Google to retain its dirtier superior position? 
Thozi.

title: Crash city
text:
UPDATE: Within minutes of writing the original review an updated app was released which resolved the crashing issue. And the developer responded to my feedback. How often does that happen?? 

This app crashes every time I try to open it on my 7plus. I installed iOS 15.1 with the hope that it would resolve the crash issue-no luck. Fortunately I have a company provided 11 Pro that handles the Google app.

title: Tabs
text: I always had the tabs going side to side which was ok, kinda messy but still ok. But recently the tabs go up and down which I love! It‚Äôs easier and faster to find certain tabs. Butttt today the tabs went back to side to side and I find that messy and complicated not to mention confusing especially when the up-and-down tabs are much more organized. So if I could get rid of the side to side tabs that I reallyyyyyy don‚Äôt like and get back the up and down formatted tabs that would be great!:)

title: Decent app but won‚Äôt open into maps
text: I enjoy this app for quick questions however most of the time it‚Äôs because I need assistance getting directions. And when searching in the app and an address is selected it will automatically open google maps but won‚Äôt transfer any destination information. It will find my location but will not copy the address that I need to go. And when attempting to copy the address to paste on a different app it will not allow you to. It only opens the google maps app again. Very frustrating...

title: Sandy Point Dental
text: So I was referred to this office about 10 years ago ! Since then I have had such GREAT service and wonderful appreciative for the dental care and there staff!  Dr. Calabrese and his staff are so very professional and personable and perfectionist!! Dr. C will not sign off on your case until it‚Äôs 100% and I mean 100%! It may take a visit or two on the extreme cases but it‚Äôs well worth the time and care he and his staff give !! I give this practice a AAAA plus +++!! Thank you Dr. C and AWESOME staff !!‚Äô We appreciate you and every thing you do !‚Äô

title: Best & Fastest
text:
I‚Äôve used Chrome for the longest time but it started to get slower and more glitchy. I was looking everywhere for something practical, fast but also something that would get me to a website faster than the Chrome did! I‚Äôve been happy since. I‚Äôm also here to say there are few things that could be used as a thought...:

Making a dark theme
Making it easier for the user to keep their tabs open

title: Nobel Prizes for Larry Page and Sergei Brin
text:
If it‚Äôs already happened, forgive me.  I‚Äôm 65 and I don‚Äôt keep up with the news.  

Google, in all its functions ‚Äî search engine, functional maps, phone applications, etc. (and that‚Äôs a huge etc,) ‚Äî has made life with a computer, IPad, IPhone easy and trouble-free for even the dumbest users ‚Äî I.e., me.  

Page and Brin deserve everyone‚Äôs thanks everyday.  I wish there were a way like the MLB All-Star voting that the public all over the world could cast votes for Nobel Prizes for both Page and Brin.  

Under Science, the Nobel Jury needs to come up with a new category for the Cyber World.  IOW, the Nobel Prize needs to join the 21st century.  

Page and Brin deserve the first prizes.  Their innovation and inventive tools, especially Google, has probably saved lives and plenty of term papers.  

Google is GREAT!

title: Live for Commercials
text: Google has done a spectacular job in making journalism, information on the economy, and all sources of entertainment accessible. I just wish that they can assist in making education profitable for the people other than Wikipedia. I‚Äôm sure that it‚Äôs all on the individual and based on supply and demand, but this is just a wishful thought in my own perfect world that I hope google can assist with in some sort.... Thank you for all your hard work.

title: Cannot Imagine life with G
text:
Life is absolutely so much better with Google. 
My dad loves history and well he is always asks me questions to ask G. My grandmother loves for me to research things for her from cooking to vitamins . I use it in every part of my life from work to home. Where do we eat? Where is there a place to buy chestnut pur√©e? Whatever one needs or wants or doesn‚Äôt want for something to go wrong, .... I actually ‚Äúwe‚Äù all depend on google. It‚Äôs the engine that propels my life.

title: Satisfied Google User
text:
I have used Google for many years. My only regret is when I was invited to invest in Google, I passed on it. I enjoy the features of gmail, the Google calendar, gmaps, and scheduling. There are other features Google now offers which I have not yet tried.

I have also enjoyed the many years of information at my "finger tips" that Google has provided. I could go on and on about Google. Google is my "go to" internet provider.

title: Best Realtor
text: Agnes is a professional. Her understanding of our needs and her knowledge led us to buy a great home in Williamsburg Va. Her patience in working with us even from a distance for more than a year never lessened. We are so grateful for her dedication, perseverance and friendliness. Agnes is also my brother‚Äôs realtor. He too chose well. We recommend Agnes Reynolds. She is the best realtor you can possibly find. You cannot lose nor feel you made the wrong choice.

title: Buggy
text: For years whenever I use scroll swipe to  move the text cursor when searching something (on Gboard), the cursor automatically runs straight to the front of the bar & everything I type is backwards. If I were to type the word Example it would come out as Elpmaxe... Also lately I've noticed whenever I'm on larger/longer web pages it automatically scrolls straight to the bottom or it'll glitch a little bit lower anytime I just touch the screen making the app unusable

title: Google
text: In my opinion, I gave it a 5 star because if you needed to know something or somewhere you just search it up and there it is! You may need to be pacific and don‚Äôt write to much for the Google search to work. If you don‚Äôt know how to spell something correctly, than talk to the microphone and say the word, it will automatically say the word in your question. Thank you Google for helping.

title: Google apps DONT WORK
text: There‚Äôs not a single google app that works properly, none of them are user friendly. I should not become frustrated trying search for something simple. Website don‚Äôt load, I suddenly get redirected without interacting with the page. All the of the apps features don‚Äôt work properly making them useless. I know google has the means do to so much better than what every single one of their apps have to offer yet I‚Äôve never seen any type of improvement. There‚Äôs been a very noticeable decline in the quality of their apps and I find myself using them less due to these issues.

title: Google marketing
text: I have been using Google as my preferred browser on my computer and iPhone, and have always had the Google app on the home page of each. I also use Siri because it comes with my iPhone. I just got a new iPhone 13. On my new phone, Google has pirated the Siri search prompt so that each time I do a Siri search I get the pop up ‚Äúfast access to Google‚Äù, ‚ÄúGet the app‚Äù button. This so annoying because I have to close the pop up each time I search. I already have the Google app! Why Apple is allowing this and why Google has not fixed this to avoid upsetting their faithful customers I can‚Äôt imagine.

title: Sign in issue
text: I got a new phone and had to sign into google again when I did I could not remember my password and when I went to sign in I wanted to send in email to confirm it was me but I also had to resign in to gmail as well so I could not do that I put try another way I put my phone number and it kept saying it was the wrong one when I triple check it was my number wich was also the one I put for the account but It said no so I can not sign in and I need it for my emails and other things

title: Takes so many clicks to open search bar
text:
I like this app so far, it is better than safari, the only problem is the fact when I open google app it takes a little bit to open search bar, I have to click the search bar so many times until it opens up which is frustrating, it would be nice if you fix that for me. It was a joyful experience with google, because it has better connection and features. Thanks for reading this

Sincerely, Ian Elmquist

title: I‚Äôm confused
text:
Why does it not let audio play when I turn my phone off? I keep hitting the play button but it doesn‚Äôt work. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs my phone or google, but it‚Äôs annoying.
It usually takes a very long time for things to load. I think that‚Äôs partly my phone but also google because sometimes other apps work except for this one.
It is better than Safari for sure, but it could definitely be improved. Overall super helpful and I couldn‚Äôt live without it.

title: Horrible update
text: I loved how Google was before the update, where you could tap on images and scroll through images. Now when I try to go to images and tap on an image, it will take me to the website. My intentions, when I go to the images in Google, is to look through the images. For example, if I want to look at cool images to draw, I am taken to the website where there‚Äôs billions of ads or things that will put viruses on my phone. Please change it back, otherwise many more people may complain and want to drop this app.

title: Late ghost notifications
text:
The google app has been sending me notifications for things days or weeks late. I just got a notification that an item had shipped. The email saying so is 6 days old. I received the items 2 days ago. Google hasn‚Äôt given me any other
notifications about this item. Weirdly, the notification is gone when I tap to open it, and I get some kind of error from the app that the notification has expired. 

This worries me that I can‚Äôt rely on the timing of things like flight notifications and reminders to leave on time, either.
